headers.subject: [R] user input in R

body.para: I'm just learning R (I don't know any other programming languages), and I have a question. I am trying to figure out how to ask for user input (say, a set of 3 numbers) then put those numbers into an array. I've looked around, but I haven't been able to find any answers that I understand. Thanks!
body.footer: ______________________________________________ R-help@r-project.org mailing list https://stat.ethz.ch/mailman/listinfo/r-help PLEASE do read the posting guide http://www.R-project.org/posting-guide.html and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
